Description: You can use Energy Melee to power your blows with pure energy. These focused power attacks often Disorient opponents.

Powers.DescLong: You perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe.  This power can bruise an enemy, making them more vulnerable to damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously.  A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets.  Recharge: Slow

By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Powers.DescShort: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP
Powers.DescLong: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
